channel.title: CVE Feed for Riello -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Riello -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8877|2024-09-24T15:19:31.932Z -- riello -- netman%20204
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements results in a SQL Injection vulnerability in Riello Netman 204. It is only limited to the SQLite database of measurement data.This issue affects Netman 204: through 4.05.

item.title: CVE-2024-8878|2024-09-24T15:14:31.153Z -- riello -- netman%20204
item.description: The password recovery mechanism for the forgotten password in Riello Netman 204 allows an attacker to reset the admin password and take over control of the device.This issue affects Netman 204: through 4.05.
